What is the age of consent for sexual intercourse where you are?
 
 Does the age of consent mean that persons of a certain age should and are able to truly consent to sex, in your mind? Are the Japanese more able to understand the ramfications of sexual intercourse as the age of consent is 14? Are American's just sexually delayed in that the age of consent varies from 16-18 in many states? *insert sarcastic smirk*
 
 Stirring things up a bit...
 
 IMHO, the consequences of sexual intercourse require that adult decisions be made. So, a large part of me doesn't feel that young people should be having sex until they are able to manage all the potential consequences in an adult fashion.
 
 Two problems with my POV:
 
 ~Many adults who are long in tooth aren't able to handle unwanted pregnancy, STD's, HIV etc in a responsible fashion.
 
 ~How does one gauge when someone is ready to make the decision to have sex or not? There isn't a multiple choice test out there to rate "sexual readiness." ;)

 I would rather he had a stash of condoms just in case, then getting a call from a pregnant teenager.
